column1: [Barnes] They changed Tyus Jones assist total so he finished with a career-high 14 tonight.
[Highlight] Tyus Jones and Brandon Clarke connect for the big fastbreak alley-oop
[Highlight] Tyus Jones beats the first quarter buzzer with a floater
Tyus Jones has led the NBA in A/TO Ratio three years in a row

[Moore] The word surrounding Jarred Vanderbilt's restricted free agency is reminiscent of the discourse surrounding Tyus Jones as a RFA a few years ago. Jones wanted $6M from Minnesota. Wolves offered in the $3M range. Ultimately, Jones was blown away by 3 years, $26.5M from Memphis.
Tyus Jones 2016 Summer League Highlights - SL MVP
The Memphis Grizzlies now have Ja Morant, Patrick Beverley, De'Anthony Melton, Rajon Rondo, Tyus Jones, Dillon Brooks, Ziaire Williams, John Konchar, and Sam Merrill. 56% of their roster are guards.
Tyus Jones is leading the league with an astounding 29 assists-to-turnover ratio. The next highest? Luke Kennard with 7.5
Tre Jones currently sits second in the league in Assist to Turnover Ratio at an impressive 9:1. In first place ... his brother Tyus with an INSANE 31:1 ratio.
